display_long_description:
Language apps give you vocabulary. IMMERSE gives you the confidence to actually speak.

Practice conversations with AI avatars that respond naturally—like talking to a patient friend who helps you improve. Join live classes with instructors who focus on real situations you'll encounter. Connect with learners worldwide who understand exactly what you're going through.

Essential Plan ($15/mo or $11.25/mo annual) AI-guided lessons that adapt as you improve. Practice real conversations, everyday situations, and the moments that make you nervous. Track your progress with clear metrics that show how you're advancing. Join community spaces to practice with other learners and build momentum together.

Pro Plan ($35/mo or $27.08/mo annual) Everything in Essential, plus unlimited live classes with expert instructors. Get personalized feedback on what's actually holding you back. Practice in more immersive locations that feel like the real world. Build confidence for high-pressure moments—presentations, meetings, important conversations.

Why it works: You learn by doing, not memorizing. Our environments prepare you for real dialogue: interruptions, thinking quickly, handling the unexpected. Each session reduces that familiar anxiety and strengthens your next conversation.

You'll see progress in weeks, not years. 

Start your 14-day free trial today!
